nodes.text: First Galactic Bank of Ord Mantell

The First Galactic Bank of Ord Mantell was a Mantellian financial institution during the time of the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, a spacer killed the White Thranta criminal Durr Roddack and transferred all the content of Roddack's bank account, in the First Imperial Bank of Core, to his own, in the First Galactic Bank of Ord Mantell.
